00496 /* parameter range checking */
00497 #if (POSCFG_DYNAMIC_MEMORY != 0) && (POSCFG_DYNAMIC_REFILL != 0)
00498 #define SYS_POSTALLOCATE    1
00499 #else
00500 #define SYS_POSTALLOCATE    0
00501 #endif
00502 #if (MVAR_BITS != 8) && (MVAR_BITS != 16) && (MVAR_BITS != 32)
00503 #error MVAR_BITS must be 8, 16 or 32
00504 #endif
00505 #if POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL == 0
00506 #error POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL must not be zero
00507 #endif
00508 #if (POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN != 0) && (POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL > MVAR_BITS)
00509 #error POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL must not exceed MVAR_BITS
00510 #endif 
00511 #if (POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN == 0) && (POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL > (MVAR_BITS*MVAR_BITS))
00512 #error POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL must not exceed (MVAR_BITS * MVAR_BITS)
00513 #endif 
00514 #if (POSCFG_MAX_TASKS < 2) && (SYS_POSTALLOCATE == 0)
00515 #error POSCFG_MAX_TASKS is less than 2
00516 #endif
00517 #if (POSCFG_MAX_TASKS > (POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO * POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL))
00518 #error POSCFG_MAX_TASKS is much to big
00519 #endif
00520 #if (POSCFG_MAX_EVENTS < 1) && (SYS_POSTALLOCATE == 0)
00521 #error POSCFG_MAX_EVENTS must be at least 1
00522 #endif
00523 #if POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO > MVAR_BITS
00524 #error POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO can not exceed MVAR_BITS
00525 #endif
00526 #if (POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO < 2) && (POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN != 0)
00527 #error POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO must be at least 2
00528 #endif
00529 #if (POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO != 1) && (POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN == 0)
00530 #error POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO must be 1 when round robin scheduling is disabled
00531 #endif
00532 #if ((POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO % 3) == 0) || ((POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO % 5) == 0)
00533 #error POSCFG_TASKS_PER_PRIO must be 1/2/4/8/16 or 32
00534 #endif
00535 #if (POSCFG_REALTIME_PRIO >= POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL) && (POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN != 0)
00536 #error POSCFG_REALTIME_PRIO must be less than POSCFG_MAX_PRIO_LEVEL
00537 #endif
00538 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_MSGBOXES != 0
00539 #if (POSCFG_MAX_MESSAGES < 2) && (SYS_POSTALLOCATE == 0)
00540 #error POSCFG_MAX_MESSAGES must be at least 2
00541 #endif
00542 #if POSCFG_MSG_BUFSIZE < 1
00543 #error POSCFG_MSG_BUFSIZE must be at least 1
00544 #endif
00545 #endif
00546 #if (POSCFG_FEATURE_TIMER != 0)
00547 #if (POSCFG_MAX_TIMER == 0) && (SYS_POSTALLOCATE == 0)
00548 #error POSCFG_MAX_TIMER must be at least 1
00549 #endif
00550 #endif
00551 #if (POSCFG_TASKSTACKTYPE < 0) || (POSCFG_TASKSTACKTYPE > 2)
00552 #error POSCFG_TASKSTACKTYPE must be 0, 1 or 2
00553 #endif
00554 #if POSCFG_ALIGNMENT == 0
00555 #undef POSCFG_ALIGNMENT
00556 #define POSCFG_ALIGNMENT  1
00557 #else
00558 #if ((POSCFG_ALIGNMENT % 3) == 0) || ((POSCFG_ALIGNMENT % 5) == 0)
00559 #error POSCFG_ALIGNMENT must be 1/2/4/8/16/32/64/128/256 etc.
00560 #endif
00561 #endif
00562 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_SOFTINTS != 0
00563 #if POSCFG_SOFTINTERRUPTS == 0
00564 #error POSCFG_SOFTINTERRUPTS must be greater than 0
00565 #endif
00566 #if POSCFG_SOFTINTQUEUELEN < 2
00567 #error POSCFG_SOFTINTQUEUELEN must be at least 2
00568 #endif
00569 #endif

00576 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMAPHORES == 0
00577 #undef POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMADESTROY

00579 #endif
00580 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_FLAGS == 0
00581 #undef POSCFG_FEATURE_FLAGDESTROY

00583 #endif
00584 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_MUTEXES == 0
00585 #undef POSCFG_FEATURE_MUTEXDESTROY

00587 #else
00588 #if (POSCFG_FEATURE_MUTEXDESTROY != 0) && (POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMADESTROY == 0)
00589 #undef POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMADESTROY
00590 #define POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMADESTROY 1
00591 #endif
00592 #endif
00593 #if (POSCFG_FEATURE_MSGBOXES != 0) && (SYS_POSTALLOCATE == 0)

00595 #else
00596 #define SYS_MSGBOXEVENTS  0
00597 #endif

00600 #define POSCFG_FEATURE_GETTASK 1
00601 #endif
00602 #if (POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMAWAIT != 0) || (POSCFG_FEATURE_MSGWAIT != 0)
00603 #define SYS_TASKDOUBLELINK  1
00604 #else
00605 #define SYS_TASKDOUBLELINK  0
00606 #endif
00607 #define SYS_EVENTS_USED  \
00608       (POSCFG_FEATURE_MUTEXES | POSCFG_FEATURE_MSGBOXES | \
00609        POSCFG_FEATURE_FLAGS | POSCFG_FEATURE_LISTS)
00610 #define SYS_FEATURE_EVENTS  (POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMAPHORES | SYS_EVENTS_USED)
00611 #define SYS_FEATURE_EVENTFREE  (POSCFG_FEATURE_SEMADESTROY | \
00612           POSCFG_FEATURE_MUTEXDESTROY | POSCFG_FEATURE_FLAGDESTROY | \
00613           POSCFG_FEATURE_LISTS)
00614 #if (POSCFG_FEATURE_MSGBOXES != 0) && (POSCFG_FEATURE_EXIT != 0)
00615 #undef  SYS_FEATURE_EVENTFREE
00616 #define SYS_FEATURE_EVENTFREE  1
00617 #endif
00618 #ifndef POSCFG_FEATURE_LARGEJIFFIES

00621 #else
00622 #define POSCFG_FEATURE_LARGEJIFFIES  0
00623 #endif
00624 #endif

00725 #if (DOX==0) && (HZ <= 1000)
00726 #define MS(msec)  (((UINT_t)(msec)<(1000/HZ)) ? \
00727                     ((UINT_t)1) : ((UINT_t)((1L*HZ*(UINT_t)(msec))/1000)))
00728 #else
00729 #define MS(msec)  ((UINT_t)((1L*HZ*(UINT_t)(msec))/1000))
00730 #endif

00856 #if (DOX!=0) || (POSCFG_FEATURE_LISTS != 0)
00857 struct POSLIST;
00858 struct POSLISTHEAD {
00859   struct POSLIST* volatile  prev;
00860   struct POSLIST* volatile  next;
00861   POSSEMA_t       volatile  sema;
00862   UVAR_t          volatile  flag;
00863 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_LISTLEN != 0
00864   UINT_t          volatile  length;
00865 #endif
00866 };
00867 struct POSLIST {
00868   struct POSLIST* volatile  prev;
00869   struct POSLIST* volatile  next;
00870 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_LISTLEN != 0
00871   struct POSLISTHEAD* volatile head;
00872 #endif
00873 };
00878 typedef struct POSLIST POSLIST_t;
00883 typedef struct POSLISTHEAD POSLISTHEAD_t;
00884 #endif

00910 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00911  *  DEFINITIONS FOR GENERIC "findbit" FUNCTION  (file fbit_gen.c)
00912  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00913 
00914 #ifndef POSCFG_FBIT_USE_LUTABLE
00915 #define POSCFG_FBIT_USE_LUTABLE  0
00916 #endif
00917 #if (POSCFG_FBIT_USE_LUTABLE > 1) && (POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN == 0)
00918 #undef POSCFG_FBIT_USE_LUTABLE
00919 #define POSCFG_FBIT_USE_LUTABLE 1
00920 #endif
00921 #ifndef FINDBIT
00922 #if POSCFG_FBIT_USE_LUTABLE == 1
00923 #if POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN == 0
00924 #ifndef _FBIT_GEN_C
00925 extern VAR_t const p_pos_fbittbl[256];
00926 #endif
00927 #define FINDBIT(x)  p_pos_fbittbl[x] 
00928 #else
00929 UVAR_t POSCALL p_pos_findbit(const UVAR_t bitfield, UVAR_t rrOffset);
00930 #define FINDBIT(x, o)  p_pos_findbit(x, o)
00931 #endif
00932 #elif POSCFG_FBIT_USE_LUTABLE == 2
00933 #ifndef _FBIT_GEN_C
00934 extern VAR_t const p_pos_fbittbl_rr[8][256];
00935 #endif
00936 #define FINDBIT(x, o)  p_pos_fbittbl_rr[o][x]
00937 #endif
00938 #endif /* !FINDBIT */

01009 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------
01010  *  PROTOTYPES OF INTERNAL FUNCTIONS
01011  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01012 
01147 /* findbit  function or macro definition */
01148 #if (DOX!=0) || (POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN == 0)
01149 #ifdef FINDBIT
01150 #define POS_FINDBIT(bf)          FINDBIT(bf, 0)
01151 #define POS_FINDBIT_EX(bf, ofs)  FINDBIT(bf, 0)
01152 #else  /* FINDBIT */
01153 POSFROMEXT UVAR_t POSCALL p_pos_findbit(const UVAR_t bitfield);  /* arch_c.c */
01154 #define POS_FINDBIT(bf)          p_pos_findbit(bf)
01155 #define POS_FINDBIT_EX(bf, ofs)  p_pos_findbit(bf)
01156 #endif /* FINDBIT */
01157 #else  /* POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN */
01158 #ifdef FINDBIT
01159 #define POS_FINDBIT(bf)          FINDBIT(bf, 0)
01160 #define POS_FINDBIT_EX(bf, ofs)  FINDBIT(bf, ofs)
01161 #else  /* FINDBIT */
01162 POSFROMEXT UVAR_t POSCALL p_pos_findbit(const UVAR_t bitfield, UVAR_t rrOffset);  /* arch_c.c */
01163 #define POS_FINDBIT(bf)          p_pos_findbit(bf, 0)
01164 #define POS_FINDBIT_EX(bf, ofs)  p_pos_findbit(bf, ofs)
01165 #endif /* FINDBIT */
01166 #endif /* POSCFG_ROUNDROBIN */

02635 
02647 #define POSLIST_ELEMENT(elem, type, member)
02648 #else
02649 #define POSLIST_ELEMENT(elem, type, member) \
02650         ((type*)((char*)(elem)-(char*)(&((type*)NULL)->member)))
02651 #endif
02652 
02656 #define POSLIST_IS_EMPTY(plisthead) \
02657           ((plisthead)->next == (POSLIST_t*)(plisthead))
02658 
02662 #define POSLIST_NEXT_ENTRY(plist)               (plist)->next
02663 
02667 #define POSLIST_PREV_ENTRY(plist)               (plist)->prev
02668 
02672 #define POSLIST_FIRST_ENTRY(plisthead)          (plisthead)->next
02673 
02677 #define POSLIST_LAST_ENTRY(plisthead)           (plisthead)->prev
02678 
02682 #define POSLIST_IS_FIRST_ENTRY(element) ((element)->prev==(element)->head)
02683 
02687 #define POSLIST_IS_LAST_ENTRY(element)  ((element)->next==(element)->head)
02688 
02691 #define POSLIST_IS_END(plisthead, element) \
02692           ((element)==(POSLIST_t*)(plisthead))
02693 
02694 
02695 #if (DOX!=0)
02696 
02712 #define POSLIST_FOR_EACH_ENTRY(plisthead, runvar)
02713 #else
02714 #define POSLIST_FOR_EACH_ENTRY(plisthead, runvar) \
02715   for (runvar = POSLIST_FIRST_ENTRY(plisthead);   \
02716        !POSLIST_IS_END(plisthead, runvar);        \
02717        runvar = POSLIST_NEXT_ENTRY(runvar))
02718 #endif
02719 
02720 #if (DOX!=0)
02721 
02742 #define POSLIST_FOREACH_BEGIN(plisthead, runvar, type, listmember)
02743 #else
02744 #define POSLIST_FOREACH_BEGIN(plisthead, runvar, type, listmember) \
02745   do { POSLIST_t *r, *n; \
02746     for (r = POSLIST_FIRST_ENTRY(plisthead); \
02747          !POSLIST_IS_END(plisthead, r); r = n) { \
02748          n = POSLIST_NEXT_ENTRY(r); \
02749       runvar = POSLIST_ELEMENT(r, type, listmember);
02750 #endif
02751 
02752 #if (DOX!=0)
02753 
02759 #define POSLIST_FOREACH_END
02760 #else
02761 #define POSLIST_FOREACH_END \
02762   } } while(0)
02763 #endif

02838 enum PTASKSTATE

02840   task_notExisting = 0,  
02841   task_created     = 1,  
02842   task_running     = 2,  
02843   task_suspended   = 3,

02855   task_waitingForMessageWithTimeout = 12

03121 struct POSTASK {
03122     POS_USERTASKDATA
03123     NOS_TASKDATA
03124 #if POSCFG_TASKCB_USERSPACE > 0
03125     UVAR_t      usrspace[(POSCFG_TASKCB_USERSPACE + POSCFG_ALIGNMENT +
03126                          sizeof(UVAR_t)-2) / sizeof(UVAR_t)];
03127 #endif
03128 #if POSCFG_TASKEXIT_HOOK != 0
03129     POSTASKEXITFUNC_t  exithook;
03130 #endif
03131 #if DOX==0
03132 #if POSCFG_ARGCHECK > 1
03133     UVAR_t      magic;
03134 #endif
03135 #if SYS_TASKDOUBLELINK != 0
03136     struct POSTASK  *prev;
03137 #endif
03138     struct POSTASK  *next;
03139     UVAR_t      bit_x;
03140 #if SYS_TASKTABSIZE_Y > 1
03141     UVAR_t      bit_y;
03142     UVAR_t      idx_y;
03143 #endif
03144 #ifndef POS_DEBUGHELP
03145     UINT_t      ticks;
03146 #endif
03147 #if SYS_TASKSTATE != 0
03148     UVAR_t      state;
03149 #endif
03150 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_ERRNO != 0
03151     VAR_t       error;
03152 #endif
03153 #if POSCFG_FEATURE_MSGBOXES != 0
03154     UVAR_t      msgwait;
03155     POSSEMA_t   msgsem;
03156     void        *firstmsg;
03157     void        *lastmsg;
03158 #endif
03159 #ifdef POS_DEBUGHELP
03160     struct PICOTASK  deb;
03161 #endif
03162 #if SYS_TASKEVENTLINK != 0
03163     void        *event;
03164 #endif
03165 #endif /* !DOX */
03166 };
